item.title: About Us
item.description: Bag of Words AI Bagofwords.ai is a NLP community established in İstanbul, Turkey. Its purpose is to bring NLP enthusiasts together and to conduct opensource researches. In order to achieve this purpose, we aims to reach people in different ways such as theoretical lectures, coding workshops, bootcamps and seminars. If you want to be part of the community, You can follow GitHub Discussion or join our Discord server directly.
